Welcome to Hayes Lee Accountants

Your trusted partner for seamless, proactive accounting and tax services.

Established in 2020, Hayes Lee Accountants is built on a wealth of expertise—our founding partner brings in-depth experience from a construction background, so we truly understand that industry’s nuances. Over the years we’ve streamlined financial processes across bookkeeping, VAT, payroll, CIS and tax returns, freeing up our clients to focus on growth. We also offer a fully remote, outsourced finance function, commercial project support, budgeting & forecasting services—tailored to your needs.
